query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS linkedinPosts (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  agentId INT NOT NULL,
  postType VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  content TEXT NOT NULL,
  status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'draft',
  scheduledFor DATETIME NULL,
  publishedAt DATETIME NULL,
  linkedinUrl VARCHAR(500) NULL,
  engagement JSON NULL,
  createdAt DATETIME NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updatedAt DATETIME NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (agentId) REFERENCES agents(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  INDEX idx_status (status),
  INDEX idx_scheduled (scheduledFor),
  INDEX idx_created (createdAt)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 385B8cqVvDyKYq8.2ff4d9bc4b3d --database HoXBpYBQ3qbVm6g7qLEzMx --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS linkedinPosts (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  agentId INT NOT NULL,
  postType VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  content TEXT NOT NULL,
  status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'draft',
  scheduledFor DATETIME NULL,
  publishedAt DATETIME NULL,
  linkedinUrl VARCHAR(500) NULL,
  engagement JSON NULL,
  createdAt DATETIME NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updatedAt DATETIME NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (agentId) REFERENCES agents(id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
  INDEX idx_status (status),
  INDEX idx_scheduled (scheduledFor),
  INDEX idx_created (createdAt)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci;
